nodes.text: Nutricakes were a type of cake. Parwan Nutricakes were the favorite nutricake of the Parwan bounty hunter Derrown, whose homeworld was the planet Parwa. On a visit to Takodana Castle before a mission, he asked the Artiodac chef Strono Tuggs to cook him a month's supply of the vegetarian food. Tuggs found the recipe's results tasty enough to keep a stash for himself, and later published it in his cookbook, The Official Black Spire Outpost Cookbook, which also included the nutricakes in his Felucian Garden Spread.
